contest-event.event-date:
March 14, 1982 D London and Southern Counties (Fourth Section)
London and Southern Counties (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest London and Southern Counties Area london-and-southern-counties-fourth-section National Championship of Great Britain (Fourth Section Final) None London and Southern Counties
Fourth
Due to the large entry (34 bands), in this year B&H divided the LSC fourth section contest into two sections of 17, divided geographically by the River Thames. Following standard rules, two bands from each sections were invited to the finals. Results are shown in the individually labelled sections.
March 29, 2011, 5:02 p.m. Nov. 29, 2020, 11:48 a.m.
